Hey everyone! I'd like to get your feedback on a new approach to handling L1/L2 token transactions, inspired by credit card pre-authorization patterns.

Key points:
- L2-first hold recording (zero L1 gas)
- Batched L1 settlements
- Single rollup designation per account
- Native support for Taiko, Base, Arbitrum, Scroll, zkSync

Technical spec https://hackmd.io/@sprintcheckout/PreAuth-ERC20
Looking forward to your thoughts, especially on the L1/L2 interaction design.
